summary: MOTORCYCLE DISTRIBUTED BY CLASSIC MOTORCYCLES & SIDECARS, INC. AND DESCRIBED AS: FLYING TIGER, QM250-H. ON APRIL 29, 2003 THE CLUTCH CABLE BROKE AT THE LEVER AS I WAS ATTEMPTING TO SWITCH INTO THIRD GEAR, THIS CAUSED SOME LOSS OF CONTROL AND A CONFUSING SITUATION THAT COULD HAVE EASILY RESULTED IN INJURY OR DEATH.    *JB
